participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Talkative and creative, Emily loves sharing her thoughts and ideas with others. She is passionate about animals and enjoys expressing herself through art.
participant_1.background: People say I talk when I m not supposed to. My dream is to be a veterinarian. I hate that my mom made me get braces. My three ring binder has my drawings of ponies all over it. I could eat less.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and competitive, Liam enjoys being part of a team and values sportsmanship. He thrives in active environments and is focused on improving his skills.
participant_2.background: I am a soccer player. I joined a new team last month. My number is 42. Nike cleats are my favorite.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
Oh, cool! I love soccer too! What team do you play for?
I just joined a new team last month. It's called the [team name].
Oh, that's great! What's your number?
That's a good number! I usually play as a defender, but I've been trying to get better at scoring goals.
I'm a midfielder, but I'm not very good at scoring goals. I'm more of a playmaker.
That's cool! I'm not very good at dribbling, so I'm usually the one passing the ball to the other players.
I'm not very good at dribbling either. I'm more of a physical player.
That's cool! I like to play a physical game too. I think it's important to be able to defend your teammates and keep the ball from the other team.
I agree! I think it's also important to be able to pass the ball and create scoring opportunities.
I agree! I think it's important to be able to do both.
I think we would make a good team!
I think so too! Maybe we should play a game together sometime.
That would be fun! I'll give you my number.
